website_summaries.verdict: A small portion but a reliable cream for most users – a good choice for anyone who wants to give tea tree oil face cream a try.
pros: Formulated with tea tree and other plant-based oils to soothe irritated skin
No parabens, gluten, or harsh ingredients
Users report improved skin after using it
cons: Doesn't absorb  quickly and feels slightly greasy

customer_reviews.title: The one!
customer_reviews.text: WOMEN: I suffered with something like jock itch for over 2 years. Doctors just shrugged and told me to take the usual OTC. Nothing helped and I tried it all. Finally I have relief in just a few days. Works great on bug bites and zits too. I will never be without this! Thank you so so much for my comfort, it is life changing!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Magical healing cream
customer_reviews.text: I think they should label this magical healing cream. Buy one for home, one for the car, one for vacation....you get the picture. It fixes a lot of things. Even if you don't have any wounds, mosquitoes will avoid you because of the smell. I didn't personally notice the smell too much (and I have a good nose!) but I noticed the mosquitoes never bothered me when I put it on.
customer_reviews.author: mooncompass

customer_reviews.title: I am a repeat customer - this product is wonderful not only for cuts/scrapes
customer_reviews.text: I am a repeat customer - this product is wonderful not only for cuts/scrapes, but also my eczema, which is especially problematic during the winter. I much prefer this ointment to the prescription medication!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Dean

customer_reviews.title: My go-to first aid ointment
customer_reviews.text: This is my "go-to" ointment. I use it on cuts and abrasions, boils, and even hot-spots on my dog's skin. It's better than a prescription powder for yeasty skin infections. The bees wax base stays solid in the container but melts quickly at body temperature so it applies like a thick liquid. I keep a jar handy, even when I travel. The price on Amazon was much better than at the health food store where I've bought it in the past.
customer_reviews.author: DdorenaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Worth. Every. Penny.
customer_reviews.text: I put this on every inch of my body! My face, hands, arms, feet, under my armpits when I shave and even bikini line. Works excellent for healing chub rub. Also, I've had my belly pierced for over a year now, it's healed, but when I wear highwaisted anything it irritates it and it becomes sore and red. I slather some ointment on there and it's back to normal the next day. I personally think the ointment smells good as well. Also, I use it as a chapstick.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Hively

customer_reviews.title: reduces redness and dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I don't break out too badly, but when i do my pimples and blemishes are so red, and super noticeable on my pale skin. This calms my acne, especially when it's on the "sensitive phase" in which washing the portion with acne hurts. I also tend to use this ointment when the sides of my mouth are dry.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for small cysts
customer_reviews.text: Awesome - this ointment made a small cyst in my earlobe dissipate. My sister wanted to try it on a cyst on her finger that is going to require surgery and after 3 applications, the cyst shrunk! I am not recommending this instead of medical advice, but this is not benign ointment. It is very helpful for making small cysts dissipate.
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: Useful product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 2 years. I have purchased it twice. I use it for breakouts on the skin or any skin irritation. It is also great as a moisturizer. Would highly recommend to someone who has a few acne problems every now and then.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Product has been used by someone else.
customer_reviews.text: Jar was not sealed. There are clear finger marks on product where someone used their fingers. GROSS. Unsanitary. No one should sell skin care that has been tampered with.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Multi- purpose and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this balm. Pros: works well for dry skin, irritation, smoothing cuticles, rough skin, healing breakouts or minor injuries that have scabbed over, rashes, sensitive skin, slight cooling sensation, doesn’t sting sensitive light herbal fragrance fades quickly, lightweight oil balm that absorbs without feeling greasy, good price, simple packaging Cons: none so far
customer_reviews.author: RedheadwalkingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The container is tiny, but the product is awesome! I like the light and natural smelling scent and how soft it made my skin feel. No matter how careful I am while I wax, I always get slight burns and this product feels great to have on my fragile skin. It’s in no way harsh at all like other ointments or creams I’ve tried before! Yes, I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Jock itch
customer_reviews.text: works for jock itch after suffering 1 year when I tried everything OTC and prescription's from the doctor. Seen results within 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: moe

customer_reviews.title: 1000000% RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! I had a hard time finding a face ointment that wasn't a cream. This tremendously helps heal my acne. Keeps my very dry face moisturized. I also put a tiny bit in my hair line. It helps keep the bit of dandruff at bay throughout the day, plus makes my hair look healthy and keeps the frizz down. Smells great as well! I could not be happier that I stumbled across this. I'll be stock piling!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is the best!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best!!!! Works on cuts,and if you have real dry hands and get splits in your skin around your fingers, itheals faster than anything I have ever tried. I have given quite a few jars to friends of mine & now they buy it too.
customer_reviews.author: fred kropp

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this brand of tea tree ointment for years. Helps with little cuts; dries up blemishes overnight. Isn't a moisturizer agent - just the opposite. Has drying effect, as well as healing. Always keep a couple extra jars on hand. Lasts forever. Only need a little bit at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Fran K.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely no itch relief. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I've only used 4 or 5 times but, so far, I'm not impressed. Does nothing to relieve my itch. I do like how it melts onto your skin and it does go on easily. I actually don't mind the smell. Usually tea tree oil smell isn't pleasant to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D. Mason

customer_reviews.title: I use this for relief of Psoriasis patches. Even ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this for relief of Psoriasis patches. Even though the patches don't go away completely, it significantly helps improve the skin and lessens the appearance of the patches. It also reduces itching.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C

customer_reviews.title: Skin healing product
customer_reviews.text: Great for healing intense skin issues. Tea tree oil is great at healing while JoJoba is great at moisturizing. You can't use tea tree oil without the strong scent it gives, but if you need to heal a skin issue this is a great 1-2 punch.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: perfect cure for my baby!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!!! My daughter had some unusual eczema type rash on her cheeks and nothing would work. I went on a whim and purchased this and her rash cleared in 3 days. The senders sent it in a timely manner and I will be purchasing again as soon as I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Works great for many skin issues
customer_reviews.text: Great product for many skin issues. A little goes a long way you don't need much. It can be used on blemishes, bug bites, or other skin irritations. Desert Essence is an awesome brand. I love their line of products and you can tell that they use authentic tea tree oil.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope V

customer_reviews.title: Great for mosquito bites!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on mosquito bites! I put a little of this stuff on after getting a bite, and after about one minute of soaking in the bite stops itching, and after about 15 minutes the swollen bump of the mosquito bite is nearly eliminated. Nothing else I’ve found can do that.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine24

customer_reviews.title: Smelly but effective
customer_reviews.text: I heard that tea tree oil was good for your skin, so I decided to give this a try. While the smell is a little strong and it is a little oily, it seems to be effective. I would just use it if you aren't going to leave the house and with clothes you don't care too much about.
customer_reviews.author: kranzie10

customer_reviews.title: Soothes dry skin, while relieving.
customer_reviews.text: My mom has really dry hands, nothing has helped, until now! This does help, as she has only been using it a few days. The only complaint she has is that it is a little oily. So, she applies it at night while she is sleeping. I highly recommend. Love the scent of tea tree!
customer_reviews.author: Cailli

customer_reviews.title: Great after waxing!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this ointment to use on clients after I wax them (brows). Tea tree scent is there, but not super strong. I have gotten great feedback, and will continue to use this product in my business for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey P

customer_reviews.title: seems to strengthen my fingernails
customer_reviews.text: seems to help my usually weak fingernails and keeps the cuticles moist.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Puntin

customer_reviews.title: Must have in your medicine cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. If I get a pimple, I put this on it. If I get a bunch of mosquito bites, I put this on them as well. Also works well at drying out blisters! I’ve been purchasing Desert Essence products for years and they never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Not sealed properly
customer_reviews.text: Just delivered. The tub was not sealed properly, and seems used to me. The ointment starts almost halfway down the tub. Won’t be buying this from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: SJM

customer_reviews.title: I immediately loved the texture and smell of this - it's sort ...
customer_reviews.text: I immediately loved the texture and smell of this - it's sort of like Vaseline for people who know Vaseline is disgusting (petroleum - ick). However, I bought this product to help me with razor burn and it does not seem to be effective in that regard. I am finding other uses for it though. It's great on lips, and I have been using it to lubricate the inside of my nose, to good effect.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy in New Orleans

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and it works! For only a few dollars I figured I try it and I'm glad I did. My face was starting to break out and in 2 days it was cleared up.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rochell

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SMALL.
customer_reviews.text: SUPER SMALL and has a very strong scent that irritates my nose, I DO NOT recomend it for acne, but maybe for cuts or eczema but again, SUPER SMALL
customer_reviews.author: Sellina

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer if you have cracked, dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Initially it feels a tad too greasy, but it soaks in relatively quickly. The scent is stronger than other tea tree products I’ve previously used, too.
customer_reviews.author: circe61

customer_reviews.title: Better than  Vicks
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I actually use it over vicks for better breathing when a cold nuts me
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Healing
customer_reviews.text: Used this to help heal a scar from surgery. Seemed to help hasten the reduction of the inflammation.
customer_reviews.author: DStop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! It heals rashes and soothes skin, reduces uneven tone, even treats and prevents ingrown hair (etc, etc, etc). I have very sensitive, combination skin and this is an essential must have for me. No BS this is the best multi-purpose healer I've ever known. This is the longest review I've ever wrote too and I didn't get any discounts, lbs. I just felt I didn't rave enough about something I love so much. My only wish is it come in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: This ointment is great. We always sooth any skin irritation with it and it smells great so that's a bonus. It's a small container but goes a long way. Good value, and I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kat J

customer_reviews.title: Good for my skin.
customer_reviews.text: It does help acne go away faster. My skin is typically dry and peely with occasional acne.
customer_reviews.author: Erin G

customer_reviews.title: Very sad, using toxic plastic container.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried the cream, was disappointed to see that it is packed in #7 toxic plastic jar. Also arrived looking used, all scratched, dirty bottom, oily top of the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia The

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rich oil that does not close g pores and helps with acne
customer_reviews.text: Rich oil with several essential oils. You only need to use a little. It goes a long way. Does not clog pores, smells nice and is very lubricating. Helps acne and does not cause it while keeping your skin moist instead of dried out. I live in the dry desert where I use it morning and night
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Neosporin!
customer_reviews.text: Tea tree oil is the best all natural antiseptic and this product I've used on cuts, scrapes, and feminine discomfort. Neosporin does not even compare. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Justina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff!! Great for everything acne and even works great for razor burn. Works over night
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Smells and feels great
customer_reviews.text: This is item very good quality. Will purchase again. Works great for rashes due to my fibromyalgia. Good for minor skim irrations as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Encinas

customer_reviews.title: Not very healing
customer_reviews.text: Works great to moisturize but the "tea tree" healing aspect doesn't seem to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Sequeira

customer_reviews.title: Great for multiple uses !!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff I use it on my zits on razor burn on my dogs rashes it works for just about everything!! Great product !!
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Great ointment
customer_reviews.text: I do not use this ointment on my face and it does not lighten any dark spots. However is perfect after my pedicures, for any scratches or any skin irritations. I also love using this after I wax my legs/arms/bikini.
customer_reviews.author: Bmejia

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I use it for my lips (protects from cold), skin and my eyebrows (I used a bit after I did powder ombre eyebrows).
customer_reviews.author: carolyf

customer_reviews.title: Huge pic is deceiving, tiny 1oz jar actually.
customer_reviews.text: Like all the other reviews, it is a miracle how well this stuff works. But... Huge picture advertised is deceiving. It's actually a tiny 1 oz container, all gone easily in a 3 or 4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fyi this is greasy feeling and will not absorb
customer_reviews.text: It made no change in neither cyst or acne breakouts. I just stays atop the skin. I could see nor feel any effect. I am happy it helps the people who gave the good reviews though.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Works So Far
customer_reviews.text: I've used the tea tree ointment for a month now and it seems to be working for the purpose I bought it. I run pretty much everyday on the treadmill and I wear workout attire (spandex pants) not loose shorts. I sweat a lot, and quickly - within the first 1.5 miles of my usual 6. Anyway, I used to get ovesized zits on my butt. However, I've been rubbing the ointment on morning and night and have not seen any pop up. It's only been a month, so I'll see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Emery

customer_reviews.title: slows hair growth after shaving
customer_reviews.text: I used this after I shaved my legs- against the grain because I love a closer shave. Not only did it prevent irritation and shave bumps, it kept my hair from growing back for about four days, and after that growth seemed stunted, which is important for a Scottish girl like me who literally has hair growing out of every single follicle on my legs. I love it I'll buy it forever.
customer_reviews.author: jeanne rednour

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic to most antibiotic ointments. This works really well for me in place of them without any bad reactions.
customer_reviews.author: cindy lamson

customer_reviews.title: spilled product
customer_reviews.text: products was not sealed correctly, at time of delivery ointment had run out of container into bag
customer_reviews.author: fabiola canales

customer_reviews.title: Good idea ...
customer_reviews.text: I use tea tree oil on my toenails to forestall any fungus that might want to be hiding there but it leaves a white residue that looks ugly. This cream is easy to apply and disappears into your skin so no one knows you've "treated" your nails.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for after waxing. Amazing smell, a little product goes along way.
customer_reviews.author: Monica G.

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I had an allergic reaction my tongue and lips swelled up and throat was half closed up. I got a rash on the top of my hands that itched like crazy. So it was not a good experience for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Love it, because it stays in place on your skin, better than the oil.
customer_reviews.author: Libra

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It’s pretty much my go to for dry skin and chapped lips even.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Smith

customer_reviews.title: Seriously aweskme. Always recomend.
customer_reviews.text: I was actually given this product by a friend years ago when the jar was 1/4 full, granted I may not use it every day but probably about 4 days a week. I use it for dry skin and breakouts and surprisingly the oil doesn't irritate my skin but rather helps any blemishes to disappear leaving my skin glowing in the morning when applied at night after washing your face. When I ran out I had to buy more so I'm happy Amazon had it for a good price- she bought for $12 in store.
customer_reviews.author: CATay

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Smells like what it is but not too overpowering. Works as an ointment on pimples.
customer_reviews.author: Eli T.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Top quality product. Will buy again, and again. Moisturizer with medicine​.

customer_reviews.title: T
customer_reviews.text: I like teatree scent. So I gave that 4 star
customer_reviews.author: qiquan xiong

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of tea tree oil when it was the only thing that cleared a horrible case of poison oak years ago. Using for skin ulcer's this time.
customer_reviews.author: DVS

customer_reviews.title: I haven't noticed a difference in the skin tags but my face is looking a lot better! Not nearly as dry as it can get ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been using this long, maybe a week. I smear it on my face after I get out the shower and on some small skin tags. I haven't noticed a difference in the skin tags but my face is looking a lot better! Not nearly as dry as it can get and my black heads seem to be going away.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful skin product!
customer_reviews.text: One of the BEST skin ointments! Has helped to keep acne away and great for an overnight skin treatment! Have been for some years now and have yet to be disappointed in this product.

customer_reviews.title: Works really well on mosquito bites
customer_reviews.text: Stops the itch immediately! Convenient to carry around everywhere outdoors.

customer_reviews.title: They got here earlier than i expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice i have to get some more of this stuff

customer_reviews.title: it works!
customer_reviews.text: works great to sooth and heal skin rashes, etc. I will buy again when I run out.

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed and half empty container
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived half empty and not sealed. It smells lovely but I will be returning

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love it!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was amazing on my tattooed skin (permanent eyeliner). It smells marvelous, and is thin and easy to spread, and really helped reduce irritation and swelling without any aggravating fumes.
customer_reviews.author: xeyda

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff!!! I have horrible issues with my heels and hands cracking and they are hard to get under control. This stuff is amazing!!!

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and has so many uses it would be impossible to list them all. Disappointed in the length of time it took for my order to arrive but it arrived just minutes before I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Bettie R. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry feet
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my feet and it's the best--gets rid of any itchiness and leaves my dry, cracked heels soft and smooth. Best foot cream I've tried-even though it's not really a foot cream!
customer_reviews.author: Kasha

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: This is great need a bigger bottle it just this small bottle cost to much
customer_reviews.author: Christina Lewis

customer_reviews.title: and it melts so you can easily spread it
customer_reviews.text: For cracked dry skin on my feet, this works wonders. It's very solid, you just take a tiny bit and rub it for a second, and it melts so you can easily spread it. I plan to reorder as needed!
customer_reviews.author: N. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Although it is a small jar, a little truly ...
customer_reviews.text: Although it is a small jar, a little truly goes far. It has a strong aroma and it is highly concentrated. Just a dab overnight takes care of any skin imperfections

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!!phenomenal for piercing care, and my keloid was GONE in literally a week.

customer_reviews.text: I love this ointment. I wear it at night to help clear my acne.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It’s strong smelling but I can get passed it because it is probably the best ointment I’ve ever used for any kind of skin irritation. It really works well!

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, and the scent is not extremely strong.

This is way better than taking medicine everyday. I used to use emuaid but this is a better and cheaper option. I just bought 16 more, I love this stuff!

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Natural Medicine Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I always have this on hand, as it's good for breakouts, bug bites, and any other skin irritation. It's moisturizing and the tea tree helps fight bacteria.

customer_reviews.title: I shave my head and needed a real good moisturizer to stop it drying out

customer_reviews.text: I love this product for my clients after a brow thread! Its soothing and calming and I always get "THIS SMELLS SO GOOD!" comments from my clients! I totally recommend this!

customer_reviews.title: i highly recommend this product

customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I bought this for my mom and will soon need to replace my own little plastic jar of ointment that I got some time ago.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my skin on the top of my hands! Nothing else worked so I wasn't giving putting much trust in this. BOY was I wrong!! Worked like a charm and has no harsh chemicals in it!!
customer_reviews.author: Princess Di

customer_reviews.text: This is great if you want tea tree oil that rubs on better
customer_reviews.author: D'Angelo A.

product_meta.title: Desert Essence Tea Tree Oil Skin Ointment - 1 Fl Ounce - Jojoba & Lavender Essential Oils - Vitamin E - Sweet Almond Extract - Moisturizer For Dry Skin, Skin Irritations, Cuticles
feature_bullets: 100% organic - This natural skincare cream features a blend of pure essential oils enriched with vitamin e and herbal extracts for excellent skincare routine
Skin moisturization - This skin ointment provides a more balanced, smoother and clearer skin with effective hydration. It can be used to moisturize damaged cuticles on your hands and feet
Soothe & relax - This ointment for face and body contains soothing and relaxing lavender oil that provides aid in relieving stress, skin detoxification, and helping sunburns
Versatile skin care - This topical ointment for skin care helps relieve minor skin irritations, such as bumps or bug bites, and prevents dry or chapped skin on the face or body
Cooling relief - This tea tree oil ointment provides a cooling relief after waxing, thus minimizing red rashes and swelling to calm down skin irritations
